title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy of binary projects (e.g., org.apache.ant), the following message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Additionally, I would like to have a clear explanation of what the message means.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant). 2. Navigate to the scoped type hierarchy view. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
